system.effect: Has X number of extra arms, gain +10 Bonus to Athletics Tests involving Climbing and Swimming. For each pair of arms it has (X/2) it can make an additional attack as if wielding multiple melee weapons, a creature must have Two-Weapon Wielder(Melee) in order to make multiple attacks on the same turn. If no X value, assume X = 2

description.value: Has X number of extra arms, gain +10 Bonus to Athletics Tests involving Climbing and Swimming. For each pair of arms it has (X/2) it can make an additional attack as if wielding multiple melee weapons, a creature must have Two-Weapon Wielder(Melee) in order to make multiple attacks on the same turn. If no X value, assume X = 2
